tasks.task: Attending a five-week training program on agricultural practices.
subtasks: Participating in lectures on updated agricultural practices.
Learning about good agricultural practices.
Understanding cultivation management and pesticide use.
Acquiring knowledge on post-harvest technologies.
Grasping the importance of record-keeping.
Studying marketing strategies in agriculture.
Developing business planning skills.
Adhering to food safety and quality standards.
Engaging in communication with peers.
Sharing knowledge and experiences.
Building cooperative ties for mutual support.
Seeking continuous learning and professional development.
Adopting a positive mindset towards farming.
Embracing the evolution as a farmer and businessman.

tasks.task: Contributing to the Seven Crops Project.
subtasks: Utilizing opportunities provided by the project.
Promoting local production and consumption.
Enhancing efficiency in production, distribution, and supply chains.

Participating in the training program. That's the main thing. Then, under that, the subtasks are each of the topics they cover. Like attending lectures (SUBTASK), learning about good practices, pesticides, post-harvest stuff, keeping records, marketing, business planning. They also mentioned food safety implicitly, so I can add that as a subtask under record-keeping maybe.

tasks.task: communicating with peers, sharing experiences, building cooperative ties.

Lastly, contributing to the Seven Crops Project. So that's another MAINTASK. How to do that? Subtasks could be utilizing project opportunities, promoting local production and consumption, and enhancing efficiency in supply chains.
